summary: The macOS Intel runner was removed from the build-gems workflow's smoke test because it cannot download the CLI due to outdated CA certificates. This feature request asks to update the workflow to support macOS Intel testing again.
userImpact: macOS Intel platform is not tested in the build workflow, potentially missing platform-specific issues.
rootCause: macOS Intel runner lacks updated CA certificates required to download the CLI
proposedFix: Update CA certificates on the macOS Intel runner, potentially using Python's approach as reference
keyQuote: macos-intel (i.e. macos-13) runner had to be removed from build-gems run because it cannot download the CLI to do a smoke test presumably because it does not have latest CA certificates
